content.question:
​

The x axis ranges from negative 5 to 5 in increments of 1. The y axis ranges from negative 5 to 5 in increments of 1. Moving from left to right: 

The graph enters the window at (negative 5.5 comma 5.5) and decreases in a line to the origin, passing through (negative 3 comma 3). 

The graph increases in a line from the origin, passing through (3 comma 3), and exits the window at (5.5 comma 5.5).

​The graph of the function <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> is shown. What is the average rate of change of <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> on the interval <math alttext="negative 3 less or equal than x less or equal than 3"><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>3</mn></math>, if it exists?

topic.text: 1.3: Rates of Change in Linear and Quadratic Functions

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
